description: Table by antidiagonals of Mahonian numbers T(n,k): permutations of n letters with k inversions.
references: R. P. Stanley, Enumerative Combinatorics, Cambridge, Vol. 1, 1999; see Corollary 1.3.10, p. 21.
crossrefs: A008302 is the main entry for these numbers. Columns include A000012, A000027, A000096, A005286, A005287, A005288. Diagonals include A000707, A001892, A001893, A001894, A005283, A005284, A005285.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 25 2001
